review: I went to the doctor after finding him on practo on the basis of recommendations. He was highly recommended. Indeed, the doctor is very polite and friendly. He is patient and listens to the symptoms patiently. For me it was like a one stop solution as the Xray, blood tests and the medicines - all were provided then and there.  The staff is also very cooperative and polite. Overall a good experience.
